name: Gerald Technologies, Inc
headline: Autopay household bills without fear of overdraft or late fees
description: Gerald is on a mission to eliminate stress about paying bills. We are transforming bill payments by providing consumers with an application for linking and automatically paying their household bills while offering overdraft and late fee protection for all their biller accounts. Our app tracks and pays bills so our users don’t have to. We offer banking services; direct deposits, credit building, cash advance and rewards to simplify bill payments for both billers accounts and consumers.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:saas; industry:payments; industry:consumer; industry:neobank; location:new-york

founders.name: Ola Okeshola, Founder
founders.description:
Founder joingerald.com
ex ceo @quick.me; conduet-med.com
ex-wallstreet executive - VP @ Neuberger Berman
@yale @georgetown

founders.name: Nikos Karamolegkos, Founder
founders.description:
PhD from Columbia University
Ex-Data Scientist and Project Leader at Philips

No fee cash advance transfer
At Gerald, we believe everyone deserves access to easy, affordable financial solutions. That’s why we offer no-fee cash advances, giving you instant access to the money you need—without any hidden costs or extra charges.
![Free Transfer](https://www.joingerald.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmockup_no_fee.40137841.png&w=3840&q=75)
Mobile phone plan advance
With our easy-to-use and convenient app, Gerald makes paying for your cellphone plan a breeze. Choose a plan that meets your needs and utilize Gerald's mobile plan advance.
![Mobile Plan](https://www.joingerald.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmockup_mobile_plan.6fdff922.png&w=3840&q=75)
Store rewards
Store rewards are free money we give you that you do not need to pay back! Purchase your household items and utilize your store rewards as payment!
![Store Rewards](https://www.joingerald.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmockup_rewards.54c14a65.png&w=3840&q=75)
Play to earn
Turn free time into reward time! Play fun games, complete simple in-app tasks and more to earn coins. Collect coins and redeem them to earn store rewards.
![Play to Earn](https://www.joingerald.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmockup_play-to_earn.4609afd9.png&w=3840&q=75)

[Terms of Use](https://www.joingerald.com/</legal/terms-of-use>)[Privacy Policy](https://www.joingerald.com/</legal/privacy>)[Electronic Communication Consent](https://www.joingerald.com/</legal/electronic-communication-consent>)
Get the app
[Google Play](https://www.joingerald.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.geraldwallet>)[App Store](https://www.joingerald.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/app/apple-store/id1569801600?pt=123078109&ct=all-pages&mt=8>)
Gerald Technologies is a financial technology company, not a bank.
1 Not every user is eligible for advances, with amounts ranging from $10 to $80, contingent on Gerald's approval and company policies.
2 Advances provided by Gerald are in three forms: 1) Cash advances (transfers to a bank account), 2) Buy Now, Pay Later, and 3) Mobile plan advances.
3 Buy Now, Pay Later advances are available for purchases made on Cornerstore. Mobile plan advances are applicable to mobile plans via Cranberry Mobile.
4 To access some features, such as transferring a cash advance to a bank account, users must first use a minimum portion of their advance for purchases on Cornerstore or Cranberry Mobile plans. Once this minimum amount is met, the remaining advance balance can be transferred to a bank account.
5 To utilize advances, either as a cash advance, a mobile plan advance, or via Buy Now, Pay Later, users must link their debit card associated with their connected bank account. Gerald conducts a debit card verification process, usually instant but may take up to 1 business day depending on the banks eligibility. A temporary hold of no more than $1 is used for the card verification process and is immediately released.
6 Advances are reassessed upon repayment of the previous advance or after 30 days if unused.
7 Users ineligible for a automatic advance have the opportunity to accumulate points that can be converted into store rewards.

Gerald Technologies is a financial technology company, not a bank.
1 Not every user is eligible for advances, with amounts ranging from $10 to $80, contingent on Gerald's approval and company policies.
2 Advances provided by Gerald are in three forms: 1) Cash advances (transfers to a bank account), 2) Buy Now, Pay Later, and 3) Mobile plan advances.
3 Buy Now, Pay Later advances are available for purchases made on Cornerstore. Mobile plan advances are applicable to mobile plans via Cranberry Mobile.
4 To access some features, such as transferring a cash advance to a bank account, users must first use a minimum portion of their advance for purchases on Cornerstore or Cranberry Mobile plans. Once this minimum amount is met, the remaining advance balance can be transferred to a bank account.
5 To utilize advances, either as a cash advance, a mobile plan advance, or via Buy Now, Pay Later, users must link their debit card associated with their connected bank account. Gerald conducts a debit card verification process, usually instant but may take up to 1 business day depending on the banks eligibility. A temporary hold of no more than $1 is used for the card verification process and is immediately released.
6 Advances are reassessed upon repayment of the previous advance or after 30 days if unused.
7 Users ineligible for a automatic advance have the opportunity to accumulate points that can be converted into store rewards.

generated_description:
**Gerald Technologies, Inc: A Summary**

Gerald Technologies is a fintech company that's on a mission to simplify the stress that comes with paying household bills. Founded as a part of Y Combinator's Batch W21 and based in New York, this innovative startup has grown to a dedicated team of 12 employees. The company focuses on automating bill payments to prevent the fear of overdrafts and late fees. Their main offering is an application that links your accounts to automatically manage payments, providing users with peace of mind.

### What They Offer

1. **Autopay Features**: Gerald's app is designed to track and pay bills automatically, taking the hassle out of unpaid expenses.
   
2. **Overdraft and Late Fee Protection**: Users can link their accounts and enjoy protection against overdrafts and late fees.

3. **Financial Services**:
   - **Cash Advances** - Access to quick cash for household needs through interest-free advances.
   - **Buy Now, Pay Later** - A payment option that allows users to shop for essential items without upfront costs, spreading payments over time without interest or fees.
   - **Mobile Plans** - Users can opt for mobile service plans with financial flexibility.

4. **Rewards and Incentives**: Gerald provides rewards for timely payments and even offers a play-to-earn feature where users can earn points through fun activities, redeemable for store rewards.

### The Approach

Gerald's approach is straightforward: they leverage technology to make financial management smart and stress-free. Their user-friendly app caters to consumers hesitant about traditional banking, providing a neo-bank-like experience without the complexities usually involved.

### Mission and Vision

Gerald Technologies isn’t just another fintech startup; they aim for a future where everyone can pay their bills on time without worrying about financial penalties. Their commitment to enhancing users' financial health reflects a broader vision of simplifying personal finances in a hyper-connected world.

If you want to learn more or try the app, you can visit their website at [Join Gerald](https://www.joingerald.com).

In short, Gerald Technologies is not just solving a problem; they're fundamentally changing the way we think about bill payments, making the future of finance simpler, more accessible, and a lot less stressful.
